required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Elafibranor Pharmacokinetic Parameters in Renal Impaired Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Open Label, Phase I Study to Assess and Compare the Pharmacokinetic Parameters After Single Oral Administration of Elafibranor 120 mg in Renal Impaired Patients and Healthy Subjects With Normal Renal Function

brief_summary.textblock: This study is being conducted in order to assess the need for dose adjustment for elafibranor in participants with renal impairment. Pharmacokinetic parameters of elafibranor and its active metabolite (GFT1007) will be compared in severe renal impaired participants (eGFR<15mL/mn/1.73m^2) versus healthy participants after a single oral administration of elafibranor 120 mg

primary_outcome.measure: Area under curve from dosing time to last measurement (AUC(0-t)) of elafibranor and active metabolite
primary_outcome.description: In participants with end stage renal disease compared to healthy volunteers

primary_outcome.measure: Area under curve from dosing time to infinity (AUC(0-∞)) of elafibranor and active metabolite
primary_outcome.description: In participants with end stage renal disease compared to healthy volunteers

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma pharmacokinetics: maximum plasma drug concentration (Cmax)
Plasma pharmacokinetics: apparent volume of distribution (Vd/F)
Plasma pharmacokinetics: apparent non renal clearance (CLnr/F)
Plasma pharmacokinetics: area under the plasma concentration-time curve extrapolated from time t to infinity as a percentage of total area under the plasma concentration-time curve (%AUCextra)
Plasma pharmacokinetics: area under curve from dosing time to last measurement (AUC(0-t)) of glucuronide metabolites and corresponding aglycones
secondary_outcome.description: for the glucuronide metabolites of elafibranor and corresponding aglycones

secondary_outcome.measure: Plasma pharmacokinetics: area under curve from dosing time to infinity (AUC(0-∞)) of glucuronide metabolites and corresponding aglycones
secondary_outcome.description: for the glucuronide metabolites of elafibranor and corresponding aglycones
for elafibranor and metabolites, if applicable. 24 hours urine collection from dosing to 216 hours post-dose
for elafibranor and metabolites, if applicable. 24 hours urine collection from dosing to 216 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Urine pharmacokinetics: percentage of dose excreted (Fe)
secondary_outcome.description: for elafibranor and metabolites, if applicable. 24 hours urine collection from dosing to 216 hours post-dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Urine pharmacokinetics: cumulative percent of dose excreted (Fe0-t)
secondary_outcome.description: for elafibranor and metabolites, if applicable. 24 hours urine collection from dosing to 216 hours post-dose
for elafibranor and metabolites, if applicable. 24 hours urine collection from dosing to 216 hours post-dose
